Other Information.Test Conditions: MeOH mobile phase, 0.3 mL min-1 flow rate, room temperature
Other Information.Additional Info: Retention time ~10 minutes, strong interaction with Cu-ions

Other Information.Test Conditions: MeOH mobile phase, 0.3 mL min-1 flow rate, room temperature
Other Information.Additional Info: Elutes immediately without interaction, behaves as large tracer molecule excluded from pores

Other Information.Test Conditions: MeOH or ACN mobile phase, 0.3 mL min-1 flow rate, room temperature
Other Information.Additional Info: Elutes first in MeOH, elution order changes in ACN due to hydrophobicity

Other Information.Test Conditions: MeOH or ACN mobile phase, 0.3 mL min-1 flow rate, room temperature
Other Information.Additional Info: Elutes second in MeOH, elution order changes in ACN due to hydrophobicity

Other Information.Test Conditions: MeOH or ACN mobile phase, 0.3 mL min-1 flow rate, room temperature
Other Information.Additional Info: Elutes last in MeOH, elution order changes in ACN due to hydrophobicity

Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Pyridine retention time ~10 minutes, baseline separation of pyridine and 4,4'-bipyridine, excellent separation of chloroaniline isomers in ACN

Other Information.Additional Info: Pore diffusivity for small molecules determined to be 2.3·10-15 m² s-1, maximum capacities 0.37 mol L-1 for pyridine and 0.23 mol L-1 for chloroanilines
